entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
